title: Large Closet Spaces, Efficient Appliances, Fireplace
posting_body: At The Crossings at Holcomb Bridge, our residents can explore our community and find their new home within our Roswell apartments.
With a selection of one bedroom apartments in Roswell, GA, as well as two bedroom, and three bedroom homes to choose from, residents will find the perfect floor plan to suit their needs.

Each of our luxury apartments in Roswell, GA will feature fully-equipped kitchens with efficient appliances, a private patio or balcony, and spacious closets that will provide an ample amount of storage space.
Throughout our community, residents can take advantage of the beautiful swimming pool, elegant clubhouse, and outdoor barbecue area.
No matter your lifestyle, everything you need can be found within our community.
Pricing and availability are subject to change.
